item.title: Japanese Knotweed next to 23 Oglander Road, 16th July
item.description:
Very invasive Japanese Knotweed is growing uncontrollably next to 23 Oglander Road. As it is not under control, it is growing and overhanging the pavement, and will start to (if not already) cause structural problems the buildings and pavement and walled garden area

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 27, Oglander Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Illegal dumping on Bridport Place, 16th July
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Bridport Place, Hackney, London

item.title: Bags of leaves etc, 16th July
item.description:
The road sweeper worked really hard over a week ago in searing heat. The lorry didnt pick up his bags so i thought the dustman might last week. Another week has passed and people are adding to the bags already there.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Grasdene Road, Plumstead, London
